sentences.en: ' stood apart, with countenances of inflexible gravity , beyond what even the Puritan aspect could attain . "
sentences.cn: 站在一旁, 他们脸上那种严肃刚毅的神情, 比清教徒们还 有过之而无不及.

sentences.en: A French aeronaut, M. Meunier , tried to attain his end by compressing air in an interior receptacle.
sentences.cn: 法国航空家摩尼叶曾经想把空气压送到气球里来达到这个目的.

sentences.en: After a year she had attained her ideal weight.
sentences.cn: 一年后，她达到了理想的体重。

sentences.en: Excessively long fall distances are required for drops of raindrop size to attain terminal velocity.
sentences.cn: 雨滴为了得到足够的末速度必须下降很长距离.

sentences.en: For us, it's something that we may aspire to but can never attain.
sentences.cn: 对我们来说, 那是可望而不可即的.

sentences.en: He will soon attain to manhood.
sentences.cn: 他很快就要到达成年期了.

sentences.en: His painstaking to attain his goal in life is praiseworthy.
sentences.cn: 他为实现人生目标所下的苦功是值得称赞的.

sentences.en: I used the scientific method to attain this end.
sentences.cn: 我用科学的方法来达到这一目的.

sentences.en: More women are attaining positions of power.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的女性获得要职。

sentences.en: Now those who die for others doubtless attain this result.
sentences.cn: 现在那些为他人而献身的人无疑会得到这一结果.

sentences.en: Share prices attained a high of 3.27.
Still greater efforts are needed before we can attain our goal.
sentences.cn: 我们必须百尺竿头,更进一步,才能达到目的.

sentences.en: The cheetah can attain speeds of up to 97 kph.
sentences.cn: 猎豹的奔跑速度每小时可达97公里.

sentences.en: The day is not far off when China will attain prosperity.
sentences.cn: 中国的兴盛是可以计日程功的.

sentences.en: The scenes between mother and son attain a tragic intensity.
sentences.cn: 母子相处的那些场面具有强烈的悲剧性.

sentences.en: They attain complex morphology, appearing as branched, tubular processes.
sentences.cn: 它们达到复杂的形态, 出现分枝, 管状突起.

sentences.en: They may attain considerable accuracy in the perception of flat form.
sentences.cn: 他们对平面形体的视觉能达到很精确的程度.

sentences.en: Top-ranking sumo wrestlers attain superstar status.
sentences.cn: 顶尖的相扑选手可获得超级明星的地位。

words.tran_cn: 可得到的；可达到的；可到达的

trans.tran_en: to succeed in achieving something after trying for a long time
to succeed in achieving something after trying for a long time
